Chap. 6 - A Soul-Winning Work

     A Means of Bringing Souls to Christ.--We need to realize the importance of the canvassing work as one great means of finding out those who are in peril and bringing them to Christ. Canvassers should never be prohibited from speaking of the love of Christ, from telling their experience in their service for the Master. They should be free to speak or to pray with those who are awakened. The simple story of Christ's love for man will open doors for them, even to the homes of unbelievers.--Testimonies, vol. 6, p. 324. (1900)
